mapper.select: select * from board b, tag t where b.board_code = t.board_code and (t.tag_hash like '%'||#{tag_hash}||'%')
select * from MEMBER m, MEMBER_PROFILE mp where m.member_code = mp.member_code and (m.member_id like '%${member_id}%' or m.member_name like '%${member_id}%') and m.member_code != #{member_code}
select CHANNEL_CODE from CHANNEL where MEMBER_CODE = #{member_code} and CHANNEL_TYPE='P'
select * from member join member_profile USING (member_code) join channel USING (member_code) WHERE CHANNEL_TYPE ='P' AND member_id = #{keyword}

select count(*) AS board_count from board where channel_code = (select channel_code from channel where channel_type = 'P' AND member_code = (select member_code from member where member_id =#{keyword}) )
select count(*) AS follow_count from follow where member_code = (select member_code from member where member_id =#{keyword} )

select count(*) AS follower_count from follow where channel_code = (select channel_code from channel WHERE CHANNEL_TYPE = 'P' AND member_code = (select member_code from member where member_id =#{keyword} ) )
mapper.insert: insert into follow values (#{member_code}, (select channel_code from channel c, member m where c.member_code = m.member_code and m.member_id=#{member_id}))
mapper.delete: delete from follow where member_code = #{member_code} and channel_code = #{channel_code}
mapper.select: select count(*) from follow where member_code =#{member_code} and channel_code =#{channel_code}

select member_id, member_img_server_name from member m, member_profile p where m.member_code = p.member_code and m.member_code in (select member_code from follow where channel_code in (select channel_code from channel where member_code = #{member_code}))

select m.member_id, p.member_img_server_name from member m, member_profile p where m.member_code = p.member_code and m.member_code in (select member_code from channel where channel_code in (select channel_code from follow where member_code =#{member_code}))
select * from CHANNEL where (channel_name like '%${channel_name}%' or channel_introduce like '%${channel_name}%') and channel_type = 'G'
